description: Creates a new user hierarchy group.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the user hierarchy group. Must not be more than 100 characters.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource. For example, { 'Tags': {'key1':'value1', 'key2':'value2'} }. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: HierarchyGroupId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the hierarchy group.

nested_items.name: HierarchyGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the hierarchy group.
